snippet: Three residents of an orphanage, the oldest just 3 years old, were severely injured, drawing new attention to the plight of orphans in Russia.
abstract: Three residents of an orphanage, the oldest just 3 years old, were severely injured, drawing new attention to the plight of orphans in Russia.

headline.main: Nurses Sought in Beatings at Russian Orphanage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
